oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photogrph of 2nd Lt. Richard Spence King with two soldiers reading letter from his mother
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: 2nd Lt. Richard Spence King (center) of Haywood County posed with fellow soldiers Carl and Marshall at Fort Gordon. He is pictured with a letter and Bible that he had just received from his mother. King served in Co. H, 4th Replacement Regt. during World War I.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: King, Richard Spence
World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
